Text: Thx for upload, the quality might be a bit bad (on the first episode, but this is the best torrent i could find ;)
Most of the episodes are hard-subbed in Swedish.  I HATE hard-coded subs!  Why do people do that?  Ruins the torrent.
hmm? could be handy if you only speak Swedish.

nice collection.  but you have 3 different shows.

You've mixed:
Junkyard Wars (UK) - which had 11 Seasons
Scrapheap Challenge (US) - which had 5 seasons
Junkyard Mega Wars (UK) - Which was only 2 seasons

Awesome collection. Including a couple hard to get separately seasons.

Thanks heaps, err torrents. :)
